title: Vancouver Island Safari-Style Wilderness Oasis with All-Inclusive Dining
description: Deep in the untouched Vancouver Island hinterlands, you will find unparalleled comfort, fashionably appointed safari-style tents and once-in-a-lifetime experiences at the uber-luxurious Clayoquot Wilderness Lodge. Accessible only by seaplane or private boat, this unique lodging invites guests to discover a sense of inner tranquillity and appreciation for the beauty of Canada’s forestlands. Indulge in all-inclusive dining at the lodge’s sustainable Cookhouse restaurant, or overlook sparkling Clayoquot Sound at The Ivanhoe with a glass of specialty wine. Soothe your body with a waterfront massage or soak in the cedar hot tub at the lodge’s Healing Grounds Spa, known for its restorative treatments and glorious forest views.
offer_address: Bedwell River Valley, Alberni-Clayoquot C, British Columbia V0R 2Z0, Canada
